title.native: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！

description: Kazuhiko Nukumizu is a high school boy content to blend in with the background mob, until he witnessed his more popular classmate Anna Yanami get dumped by her childhood friend. He felt like he had to try to comfort Yanami, but this led him to become entangled with other girls who have met defeat at love?
synonyms: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย!

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Writing
tags.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Mixed Media
tags.description: Features a combination of different media and animation techniques. Often seen with puppetry, textiles, live action footage, stop motion, and more. This does not include works with normal usage of CGI in their production.

title.native: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic
負けヒロインが多すぎる！
負けヒロインが多すぎる！2期

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.
Yuu Saitou is an animator affiliated with A-1 Pictures.

Utatane Kana is a lyricist, composer, arranger and pianist from Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. She works for Tawara and is part of KanadeYUK.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Utatanekana)

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - Professional Childhood Friend Yanami Anna's Style of Losing
Episode 2 - The Promised Failure for You
Episode 3 - Losing the Battle before It Is Ever Fought
Episode 4 - When You Stare into a Losing Heroine, the Losing Heroine Stares Back into You
Episode 5 - Asagumo Chihaya Is Led Astray
Episode 6 - Let Any One of You Who Has Never Been Dumped Be the First to Throw a Stone at the Losing Heroine
Episode 7 - The Other Side of a Happy Ending
Episode 8 - If You Are In Trouble, Feel Free to Consult
Episode 9 - Teacher Thought It Was a Stain in the Ceiling or Something... Please Continue
Episode 10 - I Suppose It's a Bit too Early for Goodbye
Episode 11 - Let's Have a Talk about Responsibility
Episode 12 - Am I Actually Just Some Unseasoned Rando Who Drops In for the Last Episode with the Losing Heroine?
